page.title: SuperTux
page.section:
Here goes the list of the people behind this project: (as a note, noone earns money by making this game, our only incentivation is the amusement of doing it.)
Project leader
Tobias (Tobgle) Glaesser
tobi.web@gmx.de
Original author
Bill Kendrick
nbs@sonic.net
http://www.newbreedsoftware.com/

CDROMs and FTP sites
Thanks to
Larry Ewing
Creator of Tux, the Linux penguin
SDL and OpenGL
For giving such a great gaming experience possible in Linux
We hope you enjoy our work. - SuperTux team
